content.text:
Hey [@maibits](@JaRaXuXCe6ujVINlr1+eu0p4rfLxgvtAPDjJJD9eX2o=.ed25519), welcome!

I missed out on Mesh the Planet, is it annual? I've been trying to force myself to go to more [un]confs and gatherings, so I'm always on the lookout for fun events (especially on the left coast) with rad friends. If I were to make a Venn diagram of your interests and what's regularly talked about in the scuttleverse it'd probably look like a circle, so I'm sure you'll fit right in.


![hermies dancing](&MICw//Vc1LOa+UDZdW1gbvLShjfRHULT4Bvp6fHelnc=.sha256)
